resources.string: Tolak Angin used for relieving symptoms associated with colds, flu, and general fatigue. \n\nThe ingredients typically include ginger, cloves, fennel, mint, nutmeg, and various other herbs.

1. Select Transfer >> Choose Virtual Account
2. Enter the Virtual Account number: 123 08XXXXXXXX
3. Enter the desired top-up amount (minimum Rp10,000)
4. Enter your PIN and select OK
